column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I've been here a few times
column2: with big groups and one on one. This is one of my favorite restaurants in Chicago. It's the only place I would be just as happy to go for brunch with my girlfriends
column4: and a big dinner with a large group. It's affordable
column6: and delicious. The staff is courteous
column8: and charming. I absolutely love this place.
